channel.title: Server War Sick on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server War Sick on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: This year....
item.description: After finishing the previous pseudo-rant.. I decided to add an afterward to new years day: Ok so this year hasn’t started out exactly in the best of ways… I had troble with k*star.. my server got hax0red.. I am sick.. I need money.. I need a hobby.. my computer is dying.. a slow slow death.. and I am tired.. thus sleep..
